title: Gunning For The Title
description:
The FC Crew discuss Arsenals exciting 3-2 victory over Liverpool and dive into the controversial calls in the match. Plus, Manchester United's 2-1 win over Everton and Cristiano Ronaldo scoring his 700th club goal. Also, Barcelona's 1-0 win against Celta Vigo and a lookback at yesterday’s referee decisions in the Bundesliga and Ligue 1
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Arsenal Top The Table After Statement Victory, CR7 Scores His 700th In Man United Win, Barcelona Stay Undefeated in La Liga
